ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“…OK.
Corneo took {Yuffie} from us.”{PAUSE}“And without {Yuffie},
there's no way
we'll get our Materia back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“That's fine.
We have no intention of
cooperating with you, either.”{PAUSE}“Now, uh, which direction did
Corneo run off?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Tifa}
“…All right.
Corneo stole {Yuffie}
from us as well.”{PAUSE}“And without her,
there's no way
we'll get our Materia back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Tifa}
“The same goes for us.
We don't want to make friends
with the Turks.”{PAUSE}“Now, which direction did Corneo
run off?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cid}
“That's just beautiful!
And now that *#$^@'s walked off
with {Yuffie} too!”{PAUSE}“And without that brat,
we can't get our hands
on our Materia!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Cid}
“Of course!
There ain't no way we'd wanna
work with the Turks anyway!”{PAUSE}“Anyhow, which direction did
that %^$*& run off?”
Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Reno
“Hmm…
Corneo's good at escaping…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Reno
“Let's go, Rude.
We'll give them a taste of what
the Turks can do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Reno
“If he has Elena, that's going to make
things a little difficult.”{PAUSE}“And uh…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Reno
“Don't misunderstand.”{PAUSE}“We have no intention of joining you.
We're only agreeing not to
fight each other…for now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Reno
“Hmm, nice attitude.
Here's a clue, it's the
most obvious place.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // “Have you ever heard of the
Water God's scales?”{PAUSE}“They're not just regular scales.
They have special hidden powers.
They're impervious to
the strongest flames.”{PAUSE}“But, of course, I don't think
they'd stand up to the fire
that huge eerie-lookin' Meteor's
gonna make when it crashes down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // “That five-storied pagoda
over there is called
the Pagoda of the Five Mighty Gods…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // “The Five Gods are Power, Speed,
Magic, War and Omni. Omni has
the best of the others.”{PAUSE}“For generations, we in Wutai have
worshipped Da-chao the Water God.”{PAUSE}“Legend has it that the village has
been protected by Da-chao,
the Water God, and the Five Mighty Gods.”{PAUSE}“But, in the last battle,
we didn't fare so well…
I guess our beliefs were
only based on legend.”

ops.raw: d0 90 02 07 eb dd ff 18 02 81 ea b3 ff

dialogStrings:
“That five-storied pagoda
over there is called
the Pagoda of the Five Mighty Gods…”

“The Five Gods are Power, Speed,
Magic, War and Omni. Omni has
the best of the others.”{PAUSE}“For generations, we in Wutai have
worshipped Da-chao the Water God.”{PAUSE}“Legend has it that the village has
been protected by Da-chao,
the Water God, and the Five Mighty Gods.”{PAUSE}“But, in the last battle,
we didn't fare so well…
I guess our beliefs were
only based on legend.”

“Have you ever heard of the
Water God's scales?”{PAUSE}“They're not just regular scales.
They have special hidden powers.
They're impervious to
the strongest flames.”{PAUSE}“But, of course, I don't think
they'd stand up to the fire
that huge eerie-lookin' Meteor's
gonna make when it crashes down.”

Reno
“Let's go, Rude.
We'll give them a taste of what
the Turks can do.”

Reno
“If he has Elena, that's going to make
things a little difficult.”{PAUSE}“And uh…”

{Cloud}
“…OK.
Corneo took {Yuffie} from us.”{PAUSE}“And without {Yuffie},
there's no way
we'll get our Materia back.”

{Tifa}
“…All right.
Corneo stole {Yuffie}
from us as well.”{PAUSE}“And without her,
there's no way
we'll get our Materia back.”

{Cid}
“That's just beautiful!
And now that *#$^@'s walked off
with {Yuffie} too!”{PAUSE}“And without that brat,
we can't get our hands
on our Materia!”

Reno
“Don't misunderstand.”{PAUSE}“We have no intention of joining you.
We're only agreeing not to
fight each other…for now.”

{Cloud}
“That's fine.
We have no intention of
cooperating with you, either.”{PAUSE}“Now, uh, which direction did
Corneo run off?”

{Tifa}
“The same goes for us.
We don't want to make friends
with the Turks.”{PAUSE}“Now, which direction did Corneo
run off?”

{Cid}
“Of course!
There ain't no way we'd wanna
work with the Turks anyway!”{PAUSE}“Anyhow, which direction did
that %^$*& run off?”

Reno
“Hmm, nice attitude.
Here's a clue, it's the
most obvious place.”
